channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Leucovorin for autism? Many scientists — and parents — are skeptical
item.description: President Trump says an old drug that acts like a vitamin can reduce autism symptoms in many children. The science doesn't support that claim.

item.title: Experts say Trump's guidance on hepatitis B vaccine and babies is dangerous

item.title: VIDEO: Trump and scientists disagree on Tylenol and autism. Who do Americans believe?

item.title: 'It's really scary': Mississippi raises alarm as infant mortality rate rises

item.title: Big Loopholes in Hospital Charity Care Programs Mean Patients Still Get Stuck With the Tab
item.description: Even if people qualify for financial help with their hospital bills, the care they receive may not be covered.
